name: Mannarocks-WebArena
description:
A slightly new look on the classic genre of fantasy beat'em'up games with local co-op!

Hack and slash through your enemies! Learn new tricks, moves and abilities, earn skillpoints, get better weapons, armor and items!

Classic couch co-op beat'em'up experience! Supports gamepads and keyboard

This is a playable web-version of Mannarocks game, which only includes Arena mode, where you can hone your battle skills, explore skill tree and become the ultimate warrior.
Full version (with story mode, different levels, bosses and stuff like that) can be grabbed for free here: https://damonwall.itch.io/mannarocks
